item.title: USB Wireless Dongle that Works in Raspberry Pi
item.description: I had my first raspberry pi way back 2015 but I never get to use it. Back then, that single-board computer doesn’t have a built-in wireless interface. Past forward 2020 and I bought a new PI on Lazada without checking on the specs…so I got a wifi dongle as well. My pi arrived first and after thoroughly reading the specs, I laughed at myself for buying something that I may never need.
